mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_assets (tenant_id, assets_name, assets_id, assets_owner, assets_position, creator, create_time) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{assetsName}, #{assetsId}, #{assetsOwner}, #{assetsPosition}, #{creator}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM erp_assets WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE erp_assets SET assets_name=#{assetsName}, assets_id=#{assetsId}, assets_owner=#{assetsOwner}, assets_position=#{assetsPosition}, modifier=#{modifier}, modify_time=now() WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND id = #{id}
